version_description:
Enjoy this amazing update!
- More new cars to drive!!
- Find all of the new airport collectables while stunting!!
- Don't forget to check out the new interior camera and the redesigned HD interface!!

Much more coming soon... Stay tuned!

Paint your cars in the new workshop!!
4 New amazing cars added!!!

New amazing cars added!
New ways to get free credits!

MUCH MORE FUN!!!

NEW UPDATE!! v4.02
New two car packs!!!
Bug fixes and performance improvements

NEW UPDATE!! v4.07
Speed cameras events!!!
DESTRUCTION EVENTS!
Destroy all the boxes!

NEW UPDATE 4.08!!! 
NEW enhanced offroad environment!!
Bugs fixes and performance improvements!!

NEW UPDATE 4.09!!!
New crash special effects and improved damage system!
Improved lightning system!
New irrestible offers!

Your wait was worth it, the biggest ever update of Extreme Car Driving Simulator it's here!

• New user interface designed for you. 
• We’ve been working on your car collection, take a look!. You will LOVE IT.
• Brand new customization system. Choose tires, MEGA-skins… and create your custom look.
• Best performance ever!! Our developers worked non-stop optimizing the game to make it work everywhere.

Stay tuned… we are working on amazing new content for this year!

Your wait was worth it, the biggest ever update of Extreme Car Driving Simulator it's here!

• New user interface designed for you. 
• We’ve been working on your car collection, take a look!. You will LOVE IT.
• Brand new customization system. Choose tires, MEGA-skins… and create your custom look.
• Best performance ever!! Our developers worked non-stop optimizing the game to make it work everywhere.

Stay tuned… we are working on amazing new update for next months!

We are working on some optimizations and bug fixing.

The new next-gen version is coming soon, stay tuned.
